page.title: 01GAZETTEER OF COBHAM SURREY
page.content: Cobham Surrey has a rural atmosphere and has a population of approximately 10,000. There are many shops and supermarkets in Cobham. It has various hotels. There are four churches in the village. The River Mole flows through Cobham and there is some very nice countryside in which to have a picnic. If you feel like sport then there is a golf course. There is a recreation ground and a sports club, where you can play cricket, football,rounders and other games. There are a lot of restaurants and friendly people.If you feel like a drink at night there are a lot of friendly pubs.
